| HistoryText             = A collection of police officers grew tired of the perceived ineffectiveness of the criminal justice system.  They combined their resources to create the [[Savage Steel]] identity.  Steel was to be their "judge, jury and executioner" against criminals.{{r|Darkhawk Annual #1}}

In-fighting and mistakes caused the breakup of the cabal, precipitated by an accidental explosion.{{r|Darkhawk Annual #2}}

| Equipment               = The Cabal had access to a variety of police weapons and resources.  They employed scientists to create the [[Savage Steel Armor]].
